conversations.english: My dear, what's for supper?亲爱的，晚饭做什么吃？
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，晚饭做什么吃？
conversations.reply_english: Red cooked carp and rape with fresh mushrooms.红烧鲤鱼和鲜蘑油菜。
conversations.reply_chinese: 红烧鲤鱼和鲜蘑油菜。

conversations.english: Waiter, can you come here for a moment?服务员，能过来一下吗？
conversations.chinese: 服务员，能过来一下吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, is there something wrong?好的，有什么问题吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，有什么问题吗？

conversations.english: All the food smells tasty today and makes my mouth water.今天所有的食物闻起来都很香，我都流口水了。
conversations.chinese: 今天所有的食物闻起来都很香，我都流口水了。
conversations.reply_english: Let's line up here. This line seems a little shorter.我们在这儿排队吧。这一队看起来短些。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们在这儿排队吧。这一队看起来短些。

conversations.english: Tu Mao, I'm hungry, let's get something to eat.屠茂，我饿了，去吃点东西吧。
conversations.chinese: 屠茂，我饿了，去吃点东西吧。
conversations.reply_english: Me too. Is there a place nearby that we can get something to eat?我也饿了，这附近有什么可以吃的吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也饿了，这附近有什么可以吃的吗？

conversations.english: Hi, I'm George. I'll be your waiter this evening. Are you ready to order or do you need a few more minutes?嗨，我是乔治，今晚我将为您服务。您现在准备点菜还是稍待一会呢？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，我是乔治，今晚我将为您服务。您现在准备点菜还是稍待一会呢？
conversations.reply_english: I'm ready now. I'd like the roast chicken and a side order of corn．我现在点菜，我要烤鸡和玉米副餐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我现在点菜，我要烤鸡和玉米副餐。

conversations.english: Wow! What's the hold up?哇！怎么塞车了？
conversations.chinese: 哇！怎么塞车了？
conversations.reply_english: It’s probably just people trying to get an early start out of the city for the weekend. Nobody sticks around in the summer.也许只是都想在周末早先一步离开市区，没有人在夏天想待在这里。
conversations.reply_chinese: 也许只是都想在周末早先一步离开市区，没有人在夏天想待在这里。

conversations.english: Do you want to go out for dinner tonight?你今晚想去外面吃饭吗?
conversations.chinese: 你今晚想去外面吃饭吗?
conversations.reply_english: Sure. Have you got anywhere in mind?当然想了.你心里想好去哪儿了吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然想了.你心里想好去哪儿了吗?

title: 北京人的热情好客是出了名的

conversations.english: Have you ever been invited to a Chinese feast?你被邀请过吃中国式的午餐吗?
conversations.chinese: 你被邀请过吃中国式的午餐吗?
conversations.reply_english: Sure. Beijingers are distinguished for their warmth and hospitality.当然了,北京人的热情好客是出了名的.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然了,北京人的热情好客是出了名的.

conversations.english: In China at least, coffee is often associated with an exotic, well-to-do bourgeois lifestyle. Coffee is often considered a hobby of the well-educated, middle-class people.在中国,说起咖啡,人们往往会想到异国情调,小资的优越生活方式.喝咖啡通常被认为是有修养的中产阶级的习惯.
conversations.chinese: 在中国,说起咖啡,人们往往会想到异国情调,小资的优越生活方式.喝咖啡通常被认为是有修养的中产阶级的习惯.
conversations.reply_english: Maybe that's why some young chaps often spend a whole afternoon in a coffee bar, surfing the net or just typewriting something with laptop. While they are savoring a coffee at a leisured pace, they are actually showing off!也许,这便是有些年轻人动不动就花一整个下午泡在咖啡吧,摆开笔记本电脑,上上网,或者只是打打文件的原因吧.他们悠闲地品着咖啡,其实也是在炫耀自己.
conversations.reply_chinese: 也许,这便是有些年轻人动不动就花一整个下午泡在咖啡吧,摆开笔记本电脑,上上网,或者只是打打文件的原因吧.他们悠闲地品着咖啡,其实也是在炫耀自己.

title: 和中国人吃饭时要谦虚

conversations.english: The last thing to be ignored at a Chinese dinner table is to keep modest.在中国吃饭,千万不要忘记保持谦虚礼让。
conversations.chinese: 在中国吃饭,千万不要忘记保持谦虚礼让。
conversations.reply_english: Does that suggest diners avoid speaking much? The same is true in the West.你是说,吃饭时最好别说太多的话?在西方也是如此嘛。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你是说,吃饭时最好别说太多的话?在西方也是如此嘛。

title: 贵店提供什么样的料理

conversations.english: Is that the Japanese Restaurant?是日本料理店吗？
conversations.chinese: 是日本料理店吗？
conversations.reply_english: Speaking. May I help you?是的。需要我效劳吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。需要我效劳吗？

conversations.english: Hello, Lucy. I haven't seen you for a long time. How are you doing now?露西，好久不见，最近还好吧？
conversations.chinese: 露西，好久不见，最近还好吧？
conversations.reply_english: Just so-so. I'm busy with my term papers.就那样吧，忙着写论文呢．
conversations.reply_chinese: 就那样吧，忙着写论文呢．

conversations.english: Well it’s my first night in Beijing. What should I eat?这是我到北京的第一个晚上，我该吃什么？
conversations.chinese: 这是我到北京的第一个晚上，我该吃什么？
conversations.reply_english: Well you have to try Peking duck.你应该试试北京烤鸭。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你应该试试北京烤鸭。

title: 你想要些糖或曲奇饼吗

conversations.english: Linda, would you care for some candies or cookies?琳达，你想要些糖或曲奇饼吗？
conversations.chinese: 琳达，你想要些糖或曲奇饼吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, don't try to tempt me. I'm becoming chubby, and I have to slim down.不，不要诱惑我。我变胖了，我必须减下来。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，不要诱惑我。我变胖了，我必须减下来。

conversations.english: Alison, would you like to have some more?艾莉森，你要再吃一些吗?
conversations.chinese: 艾莉森，你要再吃一些吗?
conversations.reply_english: No, thanks. I've had enough.不，谢谢。我够了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，谢谢。我够了。

conversations.english: Hi Jane, you look great.嘿，简，你看起来很不错。
conversations.chinese: 嘿，简，你看起来很不错。
conversations.reply_english: You too. Have you lost some weight?你也是。你减肥了吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你也是。你减肥了吗？

title: 你应该做多点运动减肥

conversations.english: Oh dear, my weight has gone up again.噢，亲爱的，我的体重又上涨了。
conversations.chinese: 噢，亲爱的，我的体重又上涨了。
conversations.reply_english: I am not supprised, you eat too much.我并不觉得奇怪，你吃太多了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我并不觉得奇怪，你吃太多了。

conversations.english: How do you want your eggs, Mary? Cindy likes hers scrambled.玛丽，你的蛋要怎么煎？辛迪喜欢吃炒蛋。
conversations.chinese: 玛丽，你的蛋要怎么煎？辛迪喜欢吃炒蛋。
conversations.reply_english: Sunny-side up, please.煎单面就好，麻烦你了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 煎单面就好，麻烦你了。

conversations.english: What do you usually have for breakfast? Pancakes or waffles?你早餐通常都吃什么？煎饼还是烘饼？
conversations.chinese: 你早餐通常都吃什么？煎饼还是烘饼？
conversations.reply_english: I usually have cereal for breakfast.我早餐通常都吃麦片。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我早餐通常都吃麦片。

conversations.english: I love Chinese food.我很喜欢中国菜。
conversations.chinese: 我很喜欢中国菜。
conversations.reply_english: What's your favorite dish or dishes?哪一道或哪些中国菜是你最喜欢的？
conversations.reply_chinese: 哪一道或哪些中国菜是你最喜欢的？

conversations.english: Mom and I got in another fight, Boris.我又和妈妈吵架了,鲍里斯。
conversations.chinese: 我又和妈妈吵架了,鲍里斯。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, Iris! What was it about this time?哦!艾瑞斯,这次又是为了什么?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦!艾瑞斯,这次又是为了什么?

conversations.english: Hey, Mary. We're back. Have you eaten yet?嘿，玛丽。我们回来了。你吃过了吗？
conversations.chinese: 嘿，玛丽。我们回来了。你吃过了吗？
conversations.reply_english: I had some bread for breakfast.我早餐吃了一点面包。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我早餐吃了一点面包。

title: 我对美式料理不太熟悉

conversations.english: There are so many eating utensils on the table. Which ones do I use first?桌上有这么多餐具。我要先用哪些餐具？
conversations.chinese: 桌上有这么多餐具。我要先用哪些餐具？
conversations.reply_english: Use them from the outside in.使用餐具的顺序是由外而内。
conversations.reply_chinese: 使用餐具的顺序是由外而内。

conversations.english: Excuse me!打扰了！
conversations.chinese: 打扰了！
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Can I help you?是的。我能帮您吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。我能帮您吗？

conversations.english: Want to send out for some Chinese?想送一些中国的？
conversations.chinese: 想送一些中国的？
conversations.reply_english: Some what?一些什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 一些什么？

title: 想生日的时候帮忙煮晚饭

conversations.english: I'd like to help pitch in with dinner.我想帮忙煮晚饭。
conversations.chinese: 我想帮忙煮晚饭。
conversations.reply_english: Really? You are joking?真的？你开玩笑吧？
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的？你开玩笑吧？

conversations.english: Hi,you said that you might need some help with preparing dinner.What would you like me to do?嘿，你说要人帮忙煮饭。想让我做点什么呢？
conversations.chinese: 嘿，你说要人帮忙煮饭。想让我做点什么呢？
conversations.reply_english: Thanks for coming over to help.I really appreciate it.First,could you peel the vegetables?I’ve put them all in the sink and there is a peeler.谢谢你能过来帮忙。你能先帮忙把蔬菜去皮吗？我把它们放在水槽里了，去皮刀在那儿。
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你能过来帮忙。你能先帮忙把蔬菜去皮吗？我把它们放在水槽里了，去皮刀在那儿。

conversations.english: Mom,I hate eating vegetables!妈妈，我讨厌吃蔬菜！
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，我讨厌吃蔬菜！
conversations.reply_english: You don’t have to eat them.I don’t mind.你可以不吃。我不介意。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你可以不吃。我不介意。

conversations.english: Tonight is a party night! What drinks do you think we need?今晚聚会！你认为我们需要什么饮料呢？
conversations.chinese: 今晚聚会！你认为我们需要什么饮料呢？
conversations.reply_english: Well, not everyone wants to drink beer. Make sure there are some soft drinks and juice. Nothing’s as refreshing as iced drinks on a hot day.呃，不是所有人都喝啤酒吧。确保还要写软饮料和果汁。
conversations.reply_chinese: 呃，不是所有人都喝啤酒吧。确保还要写软饮料和果汁。

conversations.english: Can I help you?有什么能帮你的吗？
conversations.chinese: 有什么能帮你的吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'd like the double cheese burger meal, please.我要一个双层起司汉堡。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要一个双层起司汉堡。

conversations.english: It's my treat this time. Could we get the bill?这次我请.麻烦结账.
conversations.chinese: 这次我请.麻烦结账.
conversations.reply_english: Here you go.给您.
conversations.reply_chinese: 给您.

conversations.english: Ok, so what have you got in store for me tonight?好吧,那么你今晚为我准备了什么节目?
conversations.chinese: 好吧,那么你今晚为我准备了什么节目?
conversations.reply_english: I'm really sorry, Ethan. I tried so hard, but I'm afraid I could't find a Dutch restaurant in town. The best I could do was a German one about 15 minutes from here.真的很抱歉,伊桑.我找了又找,但恐怕真的没办法在城里找到一家荷兰餐馆.最接近你要求的就是一家德国餐馆,离这儿大约15分钟的路程.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的很抱歉,伊桑.我找了又找,但恐怕真的没办法在城里找到一家荷兰餐馆.最接近你要求的就是一家德国餐馆,离这儿大约15分钟的路程.

conversations.english: Do you like cooking?你喜欢烹饪吗？
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢烹饪吗？
conversations.reply_english: I love it.I really enjoy creating a meal from various ingredients and watching my friends enjoy it.It gives me a real sense of satisfaction.Do you enjoy cooking?我喜欢。我很喜欢用不同的配料做出美味的饭菜，然后看着朋友们享用它。能给我强烈的满足感。你喜欢吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢。我很喜欢用不同的配料做出美味的饭菜，然后看着朋友们享用它。能给我强烈的满足感。你喜欢吗？

conversations.english: Can I take your order now, Madam?想好点什么了吗，女士？
conversations.chinese: 想好点什么了吗，女士？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, what would you recommond？是，你们有什么推荐的吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是，你们有什么推荐的吗？

conversations.english: Would you like to order now,madam?女士，想好要吃什么了吗？
conversations.chinese: 女士，想好要吃什么了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,please.I'd like the steak and mushrooms.是的，请给我来一份牛排和蘑菇。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，请给我来一份牛排和蘑菇。

conversations.english: Would you like to take a look at the menu, sir?先生，要先看下菜单吗？
conversations.chinese: 先生，要先看下菜单吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Thank you.好的，谢谢。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，谢谢。

conversations.english: What kinds of meat are most popular in your country?在你们国家吃什么肉比较多？
conversations.chinese: 在你们国家吃什么肉比较多？
conversations.reply_english: We usually eat chicken,pork and beef.you eat these meat a lot in your country too,don't you?我们通常吃鸡肉、猪肉和牛肉。在你们国家吃这些肉也很多，不是吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们通常吃鸡肉、猪肉和牛肉。在你们国家吃这些肉也很多，不是吗？

conversations.english: Dai Ling.戴玲。
conversations.chinese: 戴玲。
conversations.reply_english: Oh,Henry, I haven't seen you for ages. Come in. Let me take your coat. How are you getting along?哦，亨利，我好久没见你了。请进。我给你挂衣服。最近怎么样？
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，亨利，我好久没见你了。请进。我给你挂衣服。最近怎么样？

title: 账单已经额外加了小费

conversations.english: Are you ready to go?你准备离开了吗？
conversations.chinese: 你准备离开了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I’m ready. What a nice dinner!是的，我准备要走了，好棒的一顿晚餐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我准备要走了，好棒的一顿晚餐。

conversations.english: Welcome, how may I help you today?欢迎光临，今天想要点什么？
conversations.chinese: 欢迎光临，今天想要点什么？
conversations.reply_english: I'm ask for a pizza, please.请给我一个披萨。
conversations.reply_chinese: 请给我一个披萨。

conversations.english: Excuse me, can I order now, please?请问，我现在可以点餐吗？
conversations.chinese: 请问，我现在可以点餐吗？
conversations.reply_english: OK, what would you like?好的，请问要点哪些餐点呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，请问要点哪些餐点呢？

conversations.english: It's time for desserts! Are you still hungry?该吃甜点了!你还饿吗?
conversations.chinese: 该吃甜点了!你还饿吗?
conversations.reply_english: I've always got room for something sweet!只要是吃甜点我的肚子总会有地方的.
conversations.reply_chinese: 只要是吃甜点我的肚子总会有地方的.

conversations.english: I'm hungry. Let's go to the snack bar.我饿了.咱们去小吃店吧.
conversations.chinese: 我饿了.咱们去小吃店吧.
conversations.reply_english: Ok, what unusual food do you want to try?好的,你想尝尝什么特别的吃的吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的,你想尝尝什么特别的吃的吗?

conversations.english: I'm so tired! I don't know how I'm going to make it through this lecture.累死我了!我不知道该怎么熬过这一整节课.
conversations.chinese: 累死我了!我不知道该怎么熬过这一整节课.
conversations.reply_english: The professor is a bit boring today. You need something to perk yourself up. How about a coffee?今天讲课的教授的确有点枯燥乏味.你需要点东西来提提神.咖啡怎么样?
conversations.reply_chinese: 今天讲课的教授的确有点枯燥乏味.你需要点东西来提提神.咖啡怎么样?

title: 自己做饭既健康又实惠

conversations.english: Do you like cooking, Julia?茱莉亚,你喜欢做饭吗?
conversations.chinese: 茱莉亚,你喜欢做饭吗?
conversations.reply_english: I really enjoy it, especially when it ends up tasting good!我很喜欢,尤其是做得好吃的时候.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很喜欢,尤其是做得好吃的时候.

title: 今晚我们一起煮饭吃吧

conversations.english: Do you have any plans for dinner tonight?你想好今天晚饭吃什么了吗?
conversations.chinese: 你想好今天晚饭吃什么了吗?
conversations.reply_english: No, I was thinking of putting a frozen pizza in the oven or something. How about you?还没,我正在考虑弄个冷冻披萨什么的扔进烤箱里烧烤.你呢?
conversations.reply_chinese: 还没,我正在考虑弄个冷冻披萨什么的扔进烤箱里烧烤.你呢?

title: 是不是忘了我们的订餐了

conversations.english: Hello! We’ve been waiting for our lunch order for over an hour. Did you forget our order?喂！我们等午饭等了一个多小时了。你们是不是忘了我们的订餐了？
conversations.chinese: 喂！我们等午饭等了一个多小时了。你们是不是忘了我们的订餐了？
conversations.reply_english: I’m sorry, sir. Could you tell me your name and order again, please? I’ll check on the delay.对不起，先生。您能再告诉我一遍您的姓名以及您订的东西吗？我在订单上查一下。
conversations.reply_chinese: 对不起，先生。您能再告诉我一遍您的姓名以及您订的东西吗？我在订单上查一下。

conversations.english: Which kinds of meat are most popular in your country?在你们国家通常吃什么肉啊？
conversations.chinese: 在你们国家通常吃什么肉啊？
conversations.reply_english: We eat a lot of chicken,pork and beef.You eat those meat a lot in your country too,don’t you?我们吃鸡肉，猪肉和牛肉居多。在你们国家也吃这些肉，不是吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们吃鸡肉，猪肉和牛肉居多。在你们国家也吃这些肉，不是吗？

title: 我们烧烤都需要些什么

conversations.english: What do we need for the barbecue?我们烧烤都需要些什么啊？
conversations.chinese: 我们烧烤都需要些什么啊？
conversations.reply_english: Well,I’ve bought a lot of meat.I’ve got pork chops,small steaks,chicken wings and plenty of hot dog sausages and hamburger patties.呃，我买了很多肉。我买了猪排，小牛排，鸡翅和许多热狗香肠，还有汉堡饼。
conversations.reply_chinese: 呃，我买了很多肉。我买了猪排，小牛排，鸡翅和许多热狗香肠，还有汉堡饼。

conversations.english: What would you like for dessert?你想要点什么甜点？
conversations.chinese: 你想要点什么甜点？
conversations.reply_english: What do you have?你这儿有什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你这儿有什么？

conversations.english: I'm absolutely stuffed. I don't think I've ever eaten so much at one sitting.撑死我了.我从来没有一口气吃什么多过.
conversations.chinese: 撑死我了.我从来没有一口气吃什么多过.
conversations.reply_english: Same here. How did we manage to eat seven jin of dumplings?我也一样.我们一共吃了七斤水饺,这究竟是怎么办到的?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也一样.我们一共吃了七斤水饺,这究竟是怎么办到的?

conversations.english: Could I have my bill, please?请给我账单，好吗？
conversations.chinese: 请给我账单，好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Certainly, sir.好的，先生。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，先生。

title: 中国人习惯打包带回家吗

conversations.english: Morgan, can I ask you a question?摩根,我可以问你一个问题吗?
conversations.chinese: 摩根,我可以问你一个问题吗?
conversations.reply_english: Sure, what is it?当然可以,什么事?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以,什么事?

conversations.english: We really were lucky. We got the last available table for two---and we didn't even have a reservation! Did you see the long lines behind us?咱们真走运。能坐上最后一张两人桌---咱们根本就没预订！你看见我们后面排的那条长队了吗？
conversations.chinese: 咱们真走运。能坐上最后一张两人桌---咱们根本就没预订！你看见我们后面排的那条长队了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I'm glad that we didn't have to wait long. I'm starving!是啊，咱们不用等那么长时间，我真开心。饿死了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，咱们不用等那么长时间，我真开心。饿死了。

conversations.english: Smells good! What’s for breakfast?闻起来真香。早餐做什么了？
conversations.chinese: 闻起来真香。早餐做什么了？
conversations.reply_english: Well, since we are getting up so late, I decided to make a big breakfast!因为我们起得很晚，所以我决定做顿丰盛的早餐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 因为我们起得很晚，所以我决定做顿丰盛的早餐。

conversations.english: No, no, you helped me with my computer last week. I want to repay the favor.不不不,你上个星期帮我搞定了电脑.我要还你这个人情.
conversations.chinese: 不不不,你上个星期帮我搞定了电脑.我要还你这个人情.
conversations.reply_english: No, it's definitely my turn to treat you… you paid last time!不,这次肯定应该我请你…上次都是你买的单!
conversations.reply_chinese: 不,这次肯定应该我请你…上次都是你买的单!

title: 空乘小姐能帮我拿点饮料吗

conversations.english: Excuse me, miss. Could I have something to drink,please?小姐，请问，我能点些喝的吗？
conversations.chinese: 小姐，请问，我能点些喝的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure, what would you like?当然可以，你想点些什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以，你想点些什么？

conversations.english: Are you good at cooking?你擅长做饭吗?
conversations.chinese: 你擅长做饭吗?
conversations.reply_english: No, but I'm pretty good at eating!不太擅长,不过我是个美食家!
conversations.reply_chinese: 不太擅长,不过我是个美食家!

conversations.english: OK darling, got some pizzas, potato chips, hot dogs and lots of cheese!亲爱的，买些披萨，薯条，热狗，再多买一些奶酪。
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，买些披萨，薯条，热狗，再多买一些奶酪。
conversations.reply_english: Oh John, I thought we said we would start eating right! Remember? Our new healthy lifestyle? That’s all junk food!约翰，我们刚说过要吃健康的食物，我们新的健康的生活方式呢？你说的那些都是垃圾食品。
conversations.reply_chinese: 约翰，我们刚说过要吃健康的食物，我们新的健康的生活方式呢？你说的那些都是垃圾食品。

conversations.english: Oh man!I’ve been starving myself for days now and I haven’t lost an ounce!天哪！我已经饿了好几天了，却一点都没减下来。
conversations.chinese: 天哪！我已经饿了好几天了，却一点都没减下来。
conversations.reply_english: Are you trying to lose weight?你在减肥吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你在减肥吗？

title: 这家餐馆的中国菜太好吃了

conversations.english: I'm glad we came here. This is really delicious!很高兴来到这里。这真的很美味。
conversations.chinese: 很高兴来到这里。这真的很美味。
conversations.reply_english: I was worried you would think it was too far to drive.我担心你会觉得开车太远。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我担心你会觉得开车太远。

conversations.english: Waiter, a menu please!服务员，菜单。
conversations.chinese: 服务员，菜单。
conversations.reply_english: Here you are.给您。
conversations.reply_chinese: 给您。

conversations.english: Hello, my name's John. I'll be your waiter this evening.Can I get you anything from the bar for starters?您好，我叫约翰，今晚由我为您服务。我可以为您从吧台拿些开胃菜了吗？
conversations.chinese: 您好，我叫约翰，今晚由我为您服务。我可以为您从吧台拿些开胃菜了吗？
conversations.reply_english: No thanks.What we really need is a booster chair for our daughter. Do you have one?不用了，谢谢。我女儿需要一把高脚椅，你们有吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 不用了，谢谢。我女儿需要一把高脚椅，你们有吗？

conversations.english: Good evening ladies. My name is Josh and I'll be your server tonight. May I take your order?晚上好女士们。我是服务生Josh，为您服务。准备好要点餐了吗？
conversations.chinese: 晚上好女士们。我是服务生Josh，为您服务。准备好要点餐了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Do you have any recommendations?你有什么要推荐的吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你有什么要推荐的吗？

conversations.english: Hi, welcome to Happy Buddah! Can I get you anything to drink?大家好，欢迎来到Happy Buddah！想喝点什么饮料？
conversations.chinese: 大家好，欢迎来到Happy Buddah！想喝点什么饮料？
conversations.reply_english: A Coke for me, please.给我来杯可乐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 给我来杯可乐。

conversations.english: Would you like a cup of coffee?你要不要喝一杯咖啡？
conversations.chinese: 你要不要喝一杯咖啡？
conversations.reply_english: No, thank you.不，谢谢。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，谢谢。

conversations.english: Are you finished?你吃完了吗？
conversations.chinese: 你吃完了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes.May I have some more beer?是的，请给我多加些啤酒好吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，请给我多加些啤酒好吗？

conversations.english: I'll have sole,then.那么，我要吃比目鱼（鲽鱼）。
conversations.chinese: 那么，我要吃比目鱼（鲽鱼）。
conversations.reply_english: All right.How about other guests?好的，其他客人呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，其他客人呢？

title: 主菜我已经等候了很久了

conversations.english: Excuse me.I've been waiting for my main dish for quite a time.对不起，我的主菜我已等候了很久了。
conversations.chinese: 对不起，我的主菜我已等候了很久了。
conversations.reply_english: Yes,sir.Just a minute,please,I'll check with the kitchen.是的，先生。请等一下，我就到厨房检查一下。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，先生。请等一下，我就到厨房检查一下。

conversations.english: Excuse me.We ordered too much.May we take the food home?对不起，我们点得太多了，我们可以带回家吗？
conversations.chinese: 对不起，我们点得太多了，我们可以带回家吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,surely.是的，当然。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，当然。

conversations.english: Excuse me, I'd like to try some Chinese food.打扰了，我想试试中餐。
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，我想试试中餐。
conversations.reply_english: We serve excellent Chinese food. Which style do you prefer?我们提供非常美味的中餐。你喜欢哪种类型？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们提供非常美味的中餐。你喜欢哪种类型？

conversations.english: Thanks for inviting me over for dinner this evening.谢谢你今晚请我来吃饭。
conversations.chinese: 谢谢你今晚请我来吃饭。
conversations.reply_english: You're welcome.不客气。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不客气。

conversations.english: Is it true that rice is the staple food in most of Southeast Asia?大部分东南亚国家人民是以米为主食吗？
conversations.chinese: 大部分东南亚国家人民是以米为主食吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'm not an expert, but that's the impression I have.我不是专家，不过我的印象是如此。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不是专家，不过我的印象是如此。

conversations.english: Excuse me.Would you like a drink before your meal?对不起，请问你要喝点饭前酒吗？
conversations.chinese: 对不起，请问你要喝点饭前酒吗？
conversations.reply_english: Pardon me?你说什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你说什么？

conversations.english: How much should I pay?一共多少钱？
conversations.chinese: 一共多少钱？
conversations.reply_english: Let me see. A roasted duck is $25. A plate of pork is $6.50. A bowl of beef is $7. Two bottles of beer are $4. That's a total of $42.50.我看看，烤鸭是25美元，一盘猪肉是6.5美元，一碗牛肉是7美元，两瓶啤酒是4美元，一共是42.5美元。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我看看，烤鸭是25美元，一盘猪肉是6.5美元，一碗牛肉是7美元，两瓶啤酒是4美元，一共是42.5美元。

conversations.english: Are you ready to order?您可以点菜了吗？
conversations.chinese: 您可以点菜了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I’ll have the Texas chili burger.可以了。我要点德州辣汉堡。
conversations.reply_chinese: 可以了。我要点德州辣汉堡。

conversations.english: May I take your order now, sir?我可以请您点菜了吗，先生？
conversations.chinese: 我可以请您点菜了吗，先生？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, please. I'd like to start with a chef’s salad.可以了，我先要一份主厨做的色拉。
conversations.reply_chinese: 可以了，我先要一份主厨做的色拉。

conversations.english: Can we have a table for three, please?请为我们安排一张三人桌，好吗？
conversations.chinese: 请为我们安排一张三人桌，好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sorry, all the tables for three are reserved.抱歉，三人桌被订完了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 抱歉，三人桌被订完了。

title: 你可以帮我拿些胡椒粉吗

conversations.english: Let's see now. Cut the potatoes into small cubes.我们现在来看看。把土豆切成立方体。
conversations.chinese: 我们现在来看看。把土豆切成立方体。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, but don't cut them yet. Wait until they cool. Where is the big plastic bowl?是的，但是先别切。等到它们凉了。大塑料碗在哪里？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，但是先别切。等到它们凉了。大塑料碗在哪里？

conversations.english: What is this? I didn't order that.这是什么? 我没有点这个.
conversations.chinese: 这是什么? 我没有点这个.
conversations.reply_english: I’m terribly sorry. May I have your order again? I'll get it right away.很抱歉.您能再点一次吗? 我会马上替你下单。
conversations.reply_chinese: 很抱歉.您能再点一次吗? 我会马上替你下单。

conversations.english: Ann, stop bugging Jess and help me order something new. Lattes are so passe these days.小安，别再跟洁丝抬杠了，帮我点一些新口味。最近已经不流行喝那堤了。
conversations.chinese: 小安，别再跟洁丝抬杠了，帮我点一些新口味。最近已经不流行喝那堤了。
conversations.reply_english: Why don't you try an Americano? Espresso with water.你何不试试美式咖啡？浓缩咖啡加水。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你何不试试美式咖啡？浓缩咖啡加水。

conversations.english: Good envening,do you have a reservation?晚上好，你有提前预订吗？
conversations.chinese: 晚上好，你有提前预订吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, we’ve got a reservation. The name is Ann.是的，我们已经预定了。名字是安。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我们已经预定了。名字是安。

conversations.english: Are you ready to order now, sir?先生，你现在准备好点菜吗？
conversations.chinese: 先生，你现在准备好点菜吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, let me have this roast beef special.是的，我要一份特价烤牛肉。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我要一份特价烤牛肉。

title: 我认为账单这里有错误

conversations.english: Will you bring our bill, please?请把账单拿来好吗？
conversations.chinese: 请把账单拿来好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, certainly. I'll be back in a minute.Here you are.是的，当然，我马上就回来.这就是。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，当然，我马上就回来.这就是。

conversations.english: You are from Japan, aren't you?你是从日本来的，是吗？
conversations.chinese: 你是从日本来的，是吗？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, yes!啊，是的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 啊，是的。

conversations.english: This broth is wonderful. What's in it?清汤很棒。里头有什么？
conversations.chinese: 清汤很棒。里头有什么？
conversations.reply_english: Lamb and beef. It will get even tastier when we add the veggies!羊肉和牛肉。等我们放蔬菜进去之后会味道更好！
conversations.reply_chinese: 羊肉和牛肉。等我们放蔬菜进去之后会味道更好！

conversations.english: Good evening. Do you have a reservation?晚上好。你们有预定吗？
conversations.chinese: 晚上好。你们有预定吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, we don't.不，我们没有。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，我们没有。

conversations.english: Have you finished?你吃饱了吗？
conversations.chinese: 你吃饱了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes ,but dinner was excellent是的，这餐食太棒了！
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，这餐食太棒了！

conversations.english: Hi, could we have two orange juice smoothies?嗨，给我们两杯柳丁汁冻饮好吗？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，给我们两杯柳丁汁冻饮好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Would you like those with yogurt?你们要加优格吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你们要加优格吗？

conversations.english: Mmm. Nice and crunchy. And they leave a space uncovered for you to hold...嗯。酥脆爽口。而且草莓还保留了一部分没沾，方便你拿……
conversations.chinese: 嗯。酥脆爽口。而且草莓还保留了一部分没沾，方便你拿……
conversations.reply_english: They're so much fun to eat. You can suck all the coating off first...这些吃起来很好玩的。你可以先含在嘴里把糖衣吮掉……
conversations.reply_chinese: 这些吃起来很好玩的。你可以先含在嘴里把糖衣吮掉……

conversations.english: Well, it's illegal to bring food and drinks into the theater.带食物饮料进戏院是违反规定的。
conversations.chinese: 带食物饮料进戏院是违反规定的。
conversations.reply_english: Too bad. I did anyway.真糟啊。反正我都已经带了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 真糟啊。反正我都已经带了。

conversations.english: I'm going to go to the concession stand and get some popcorn and Coke.我要去小卖部买些爆米花和可乐。
conversations.chinese: 我要去小卖部买些爆米花和可乐。
conversations.reply_english: Go ahead. Waste your money.去吧。浪费你的钱吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 去吧。浪费你的钱吧。

conversations.english: Hey! A real cook gets down and dirty. Besides, I think I look good covered in baking mix...嘿！真正的大厨就是如此全心投入，不拘小节。而且，我浑身沾满松饼粉时似乎挺美的…
conversations.chinese: 嘿！真正的大厨就是如此全心投入，不拘小节。而且，我浑身沾满松饼粉时似乎挺美的…
conversations.reply_english: What concoction are you making?你在做什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你在做什么？

conversations.english: Yes. Of my mother standing in the kitchen and me doing my homework before school...对。想起我妈在厨房里忙，而我在那里做作业……
conversations.chinese: 对。想起我妈在厨房里忙，而我在那里做作业……
conversations.reply_english: How sweet...if you make me some more toast, I'll let you use my new retro toaster...真是甜蜜的家庭……你帮我弄些吐司，我就让你用我的复古造型烤面包机……
conversations.reply_chinese: 真是甜蜜的家庭……你帮我弄些吐司，我就让你用我的复古造型烤面包机……

conversations.english: Are you making what I think you're making?你真的在做我猜想你在做的食物吗？
conversations.chinese: 你真的在做我猜想你在做的食物吗？
conversations.reply_english: Nothing but the best, Cinnamon toast.正是无与伦比的,肉桂吐司。
conversations.reply_chinese: 正是无与伦比的,肉桂吐司。

conversations.english: You'll love this. It's a chick drink.你会喜欢的。这是女士饮料。
conversations.chinese: 你会喜欢的。这是女士饮料。
conversations.reply_english: What's that supposed to mean—that it's weak?那是什么意思——酒精度很低吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是什么意思——酒精度很低吗？

conversations.english: I'm famished! Let's get some grub!我饿昏了！我们来吃点东西吧！
conversations.chinese: 我饿昏了！我们来吃点东西吧！
conversations.reply_english: I'm in the mood for some chips and salsa.我想吃点脆片配辣酱。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想吃点脆片配辣酱。

conversations.english: Oh! My mouth is on fire!噢！我的嘴要冒火了！
conversations.chinese: 噢！我的嘴要冒火了！
conversations.reply_english: I feel so good. That warm hot pot certainly fits the spot on winter nights.我觉得好爽。在冬夜里最适合来上一锅热热的麻辣锅了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得好爽。在冬夜里最适合来上一锅热热的麻辣锅了。

conversations.english: This is where we sing? These booths are so comfortable I think I could fall asleep!我们是在这里唱歌？这些包厢好舒服喔，要我在里面睡觉都可以！
conversations.chinese: 我们是在这里唱歌？这些包厢好舒服喔，要我在里面睡觉都可以！
conversations.reply_english: Let's order something to eat. What are you in the mood for?我们来点东西吃。你想吃什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们来点东西吃。你想吃什么？

conversations.english: Am I ever hungry? When will supper be ready?我肚子饿了吗？晚饭什么时候能准备好?
conversations.chinese: 我肚子饿了吗？晚饭什么时候能准备好?
conversations.reply_english: It's almost ready. Can you set the table?差不多好了。你能帮忙摆桌子吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 差不多好了。你能帮忙摆桌子吗？

conversations.reply_chinese: 差不多准备好了。你能帮忙摆桌子吗？

conversations.english: Hello! I'm sorry to bother you. This is a complimentary fruit tray. Your food will be ready soon.你们好！抱歉打扰下。这是本店送的免费水果拼盘。你们点的东西马上就来。

conversations.reply_chinese: 要订什么？

title: 你能推荐今天的特色菜吗

conversations.chinese: 你们有空位吗？

conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。这边请。

conversations.english: What would you like to drink?你要喝什么？
conversations.chinese: 你要喝什么？
conversations.reply_english: I'd like a coke.我要可乐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要可乐。

conversations.english: Waitress.女服务员。
conversations.chinese: 女服务员。
conversations.reply_english: Yes sir. How can I help you?是的，先生。我能帮您吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，先生。我能帮您吗？

conversations.english: What do you want, Ressie?Ressie，你要什么？
conversations.chinese: Ressie，你要什么？
conversations.reply_english: A cup of coffee and an apple pie. How about you?我要一杯咖啡和一个苹果派。你呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要一杯咖啡和一个苹果派。你呢？

title: 感激你们做这么丰盛的饭菜

conversations.english: I want you to know how much I appreciate these terrific meals you’ve been cooking. Do you guys always eat this well?我真的很感激你们做这么丰盛的饭菜。你们都经常吃这么好吗？
conversations.chinese: 我真的很感激你们做这么丰盛的饭菜。你们都经常吃这么好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Not really. During the week, we’re both busy with our jobs, so there isn’t much time to cook anything fancy.并不是这样。平时我们都忙于工作，所以没有多少时间烹饪出花样。
conversations.reply_chinese: 并不是这样。平时我们都忙于工作，所以没有多少时间烹饪出花样。

conversations.english: There’s so much food on the table, I don’t know where to begin.桌上这么多菜，我都不知道从哪里开始。
conversations.chinese: 桌上这么多菜，我都不知道从哪里开始。
conversations.reply_english: Pass your plate down to Chuck, Tina. He’ll put meat on it. He always carves the turkey.把你的盘子递给查克，蒂娜。他会把肉放在上面。他总是切火鸡。
conversations.reply_chinese: 把你的盘子递给查克，蒂娜。他会把肉放在上面。他总是切火鸡。

conversations.english: Have you made a reservation,sir?先生，您订位子了吗？
conversations.chinese: 先生，您订位子了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,I reserved a table for six people.是的，我订了六个人的位子。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我订了六个人的位子。

conversations.chinese: 您喜欢哪家餐馆？

conversations.reply_chinese: 我想尝尝墨西哥风味。

title: 换换口味吃中餐怎么样

conversations.english: Say,how about having Chinese food for a change?换换口味吃中餐怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 换换口味吃中餐怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Great idea!I like authentic Chinese food.太好了。我喜欢地道的中国菜。
conversations.reply_chinese: 太好了。我喜欢地道的中国菜。

conversations.english: What's special for today?今天的风味菜是什么？
conversations.chinese: 今天的风味菜是什么？
conversations.reply_english: Sweet and sour prok chops,Madam.糖醋排骨。
conversations.reply_chinese: 糖醋排骨。

conversations.english: Let's have seafood for a change.How about oyster and lobster?我们吃海鲜换换口味吧.牡蛎和龙虾怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 我们吃海鲜换换口味吧.牡蛎和龙虾怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: I couldn't agree more!我完全同意！
conversations.reply_chinese: 我完全同意！

conversations.english: May I have your order,gentlemen?先生们，点什么菜？
conversations.chinese: 先生们，点什么菜？
conversations.reply_english: I think I'll take braised chicken.我喜欢炖鸡肉。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢炖鸡肉。

conversations.english: What kind of Chinese food do you serve?你们有哪些中国菜？
conversations.chinese: 你们有哪些中国菜？
conversations.reply_english: Authentic Cantonese cuisine.正宗的广东菜。
conversations.reply_chinese: 正宗的广东菜。

title: 牛排要多嫩的 Have steak and a beer

conversations.english: I'd like to have steak and a beer.我要牛排和一杯啤酒。
conversations.chinese: 我要牛排和一杯啤酒。
conversations.reply_english: Would you like it rare,medium or well-done?牛排嫩点儿、适中、还是老一点儿？
conversations.reply_chinese: 牛排嫩点儿、适中、还是老一点儿？

conversations.reply_english: Which dish do you like most?你最爱吃什么菜？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你最爱吃什么菜？

conversations.english: Which do you prefer,sour peppery soup or four-jewel soup?你喜欢什么汤，酸辣汤还是四宝汤？
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢什么汤，酸辣汤还是四宝汤？

conversations.reply_chinese: 吃什么都行，我对汤不太挑剔。

conversations.english: This is the White Rose Restaurant.May I help you?我是白玫瑰酒家，能帮您吗？
conversations.chinese: 我是白玫瑰酒家，能帮您吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,I'd like to make reservation for tonight,a table for five,please.是的，我想预订今晚的座位，一个桌位，五个人
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想预订今晚的座位，一个桌位，五个人

conversations.chinese: 你想点菜吗？

conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我要西红柿汤，给我朋友来蘑菇汤

conversations.chinese: 饭前来杯茶怎么样？

conversations.reply_chinese: 好吧，谢谢。

conversations.english: What would you like to eat,sir?先生想要些什么？
conversations.chinese: 先生想要些什么？

conversations.chinese: 要不要来点色拉？

conversations.reply_chinese: 要。今天给我们推荐什么？

conversations.reply_chinese: 要什么呢？

conversations.english: I would suggest roast beef,sir.我建议您来烤肉，先生。
conversations.chinese: 我建议您来烤肉，先生。

conversations.reply_chinese: 好吧，请来烤肉。我想先来点汤。

conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，你要用哪一种色拉佐料？

conversations.chinese: 你能给我看看账单吗？

conversations.reply_chinese: 如果你不介意我就不吃了，我喝点汤吧。我应该节食。

conversations.reply_chinese: 不用了，恐怕那道菜我们也不要了，因为搞不清合不合我们的胃口。

conversations.reply_chinese: 肯定要尝尝！真好吃。

conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，请问您有订位吗？

conversations.chinese: 今天什么好吃？

conversations.reply_chinese: 今天的鲑鱼很好，很新鲜。

conversations.chinese: 我们是不是应该给点小费呀。这里的服务挺好的。

conversations.reply_chinese: 是呀，我想我们应该给。通常应该给多少。

conversations.english: Let’s eat out tonight .I don’t feel like cooking.晚上出去吃吧？我今天不想做饭。

conversations.reply_chinese: 提姆，你要跟我们一起吃饭吗？

conversations.english: Are you ready to order or delaying a little more time?可以点菜了吗，还是要等一会？

conversations.reply_chinese: 可以点餐了，请给我鸡汤。

conversations.english: Can I bring you anything else?还需要些什么吗？
conversations.chinese: 还需要些什么吗？

conversations.reply_chinese: 不用了，请买单。

conversations.chinese: 请问你要点儿什么？

conversations.reply_chinese: 一个汉堡和一份大薯条？

conversations.english: Could you show me what you've got?你们都有哪些菜？
conversations.chinese: 你们都有哪些菜？

conversations.reply_chinese: 如果你们喜欢吃鸡肉，我们这儿的鸡菜都不错

conversations.english: I'm starving. Let's get something to eat.我饿死了。去吃点东西吧。
conversations.chinese: 我饿死了。去吃点东西吧。

conversations.reply_chinese: 我们可以在附近吃吃就好了吗。我不想走太远。

conversations.chinese: 午安，乔凡尼叔叔！
conversations.reply_english: Since when was I your uncle? What's that?我何时成了你叔叔？那是啥玩意？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我何时成了你叔叔？那是啥玩意？

conversations.english: Cute...Here. These beans are already ground. Now for step three: Let the brewing begin!太好了。这些咖啡豆已经准备好了。现在进行第三步：让我们一起煮咖啡吧！
conversations.chinese: 太好了。这些咖啡豆已经准备好了。现在进行第三步：让我们一起煮咖啡吧！
conversations.reply_english: So soon?这么快？
conversations.reply_chinese: 这么快？

conversations.english: It's Chinese New Year! That means it's time to eat hot pot!农历年到了！代表现在是吃火锅的时节！
conversations.chinese: 农历年到了！代表现在是吃火锅的时节！
conversations.reply_english: Let's eat the kind that has both spicy and mild broth in one pot.咱们来吃那种锅子里的汤一边辣，一边不辣的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 咱们来吃那种锅子里的汤一边辣，一边不辣的。

conversations.english: Any new ideas on the Mr. Fro case? How can we give this motor oil a new brand identity?法洛先生的案子有什么新点子吗？我们要怎么给这种机油新的品牌特性？
conversations.chinese: 法洛先生的案子有什么新点子吗？我们要怎么给这种机油新的品牌特性？

conversations.reply_chinese: 让我喝喝早上的咖啡，好让大脑恢复运作吧。

conversations.chinese: 我的拿铁看起来像上个月我们做广告的那种鞋油。

conversations.reply_chinese: 对呀，再去喝点咖啡吧！

conversations.english: Barista, I'll have a frappuccino.吧台，我要一杯法布奇诺。
conversations.chinese: 吧台，我要一杯法布奇诺。
conversations.reply_english: What a girly drink. I'll take a bag of the Blue Mountain and a decaf breva...真是女性化的饮料。我要买包蓝山和一杯低咖啡因的布雷瓦……
conversations.reply_chinese: 真是女性化的饮料。我要买包蓝山和一杯低咖啡因的布雷瓦……

title: 好吃的埃塞俄比亚餐厅

conversations.english: How do I look? I love these braids. They're fun!我看起来如何？我好喜欢这些辫子。它们好有趣！
conversations.chinese: 我看起来如何？我好喜欢这些辫子。它们好有趣！
conversations.reply_english: They look great! Hey, are you hungry? I know a good Ethiopian restaurant－Meskerem.看起来太棒了！嘿，你饿不饿？我知道一家好吃的埃塞俄比亚餐厅──玛斯克林餐厅。
conversations.reply_chinese: 看起来太棒了！嘿，你饿不饿？我知道一家好吃的埃塞俄比亚餐厅──玛斯克林餐厅。

conversations.english: Good evening Ms. Jackson. Fancy meeting you here.晚安，杰克森小姐。在这遇见你真是太奇妙了。
conversations.chinese: 晚安，杰克森小姐。在这遇见你真是太奇妙了。
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Clyde. This is my friend, Wen. She's visiting from UCLA.嗨，克莱德。这是我的朋友，小雯。她从加州大学洛杉矶分校来找我。
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，克莱德。这是我的朋友，小雯。她从加州大学洛杉矶分校来找我。

conversations.english: This is such a nice restaurant! I feel so classy!好漂亮的饭店啊！感觉这里档次很高。
conversations.chinese: 好漂亮的饭店啊！感觉这里档次很高。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, it's a little bit pricey, but they serve the best seafood in town.是的，就是有些贵，但是这里的海鲜是全城最好的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，就是有些贵，但是这里的海鲜是全城最好的。

conversations.english: What's for dinner?晚餐吃什么？
conversations.chinese: 晚餐吃什么？
conversations.reply_english: Leftovers.剩饭。
conversations.reply_chinese: 剩饭。

conversations.english: What Can I get you?您需要点什么？
conversations.chinese: 您需要点什么？
conversations.reply_english: I' ll have a Cosmo please.我要一杯卡兹莫酒。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要一杯卡兹莫酒。

title: 垃圾食品不利于身体健康

conversations.english: I'm hungry, let's order up something to eat.我饿了，我们点点东西吃吧。
conversations.chinese: 我饿了，我们点点东西吃吧。
conversations.reply_english: Ok, maybe we can order a soup and a salad from the restaurant down the street.好的，也许我们去街边的饭店点些汤和色拉。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，也许我们去街边的饭店点些汤和色拉。

conversations.english: OK, so are you ready to learn how to bake a cake?好的，你现在准备好了如何做一块蛋糕了吗？
conversations.chinese: 好的，你现在准备好了如何做一块蛋糕了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Almost, let me just put my apron on.差不多，让我把我的围裙穿上。
conversations.reply_chinese: 差不多，让我把我的围裙穿上。

conversations.english: What did you cook?你做了什么好吃的？
conversations.chinese: 你做了什么好吃的？
conversations.reply_english: Well, as you know I was in Thailand last month, and I took a cooking class! So I prepared some of my favorite dishes.嗯，你知道的我上个月在泰国，我在那儿上了烹饪课！因此我准备了一些我喜欢的菜。
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，你知道的我上个月在泰国，我在那儿上了烹饪课！因此我准备了一些我喜欢的菜。

conversations.english: Hello sir, welcome to Pistolera restaurant. May I take your order?先生您好，欢迎来到Pistolera餐厅就餐，能告诉我需要点哪些食物吗？
conversations.chinese: 先生您好，欢迎来到Pistolera餐厅就餐，能告诉我需要点哪些食物吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I would like the chicken cheese enchiladas with a side of guacamole.好的。我想要一份有奶酪微辣的墨西哥鸡肉蔬菜卷，并且一边有鳄梨味的色拉酱。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的。我想要一份有奶酪微辣的墨西哥鸡肉蔬菜卷，并且一边有鳄梨味的色拉酱。

conversations.english: I know why Mr. Fro didn't like our ad idea! He doesn't know the first thing about coffee.我知道法洛先生为什么不喜欢我们广告的点子了！他根本完全不懂咖啡。
conversations.chinese: 我知道法洛先生为什么不喜欢我们广告的点子了！他根本完全不懂咖啡。
conversations.reply_english: True. I always see him drinking instant.对，我老是看他喝即溶咖啡。
conversations.reply_chinese: 对，我老是看他喝即溶咖啡。

title: 纯咖啡尝起来怪怪的 It tastes funny

conversations.english: Look, there's no way we can convince people they need fresh motor oil every morning.听着，我们不可能说服大家每天早上都需要新鲜机油的。
conversations.chinese: 听着，我们不可能说服大家每天早上都需要新鲜机油的。
conversations.reply_english: No, but you can let them know that yours is the cream of the crop-the purest motor oil in the world. Careful, hold it by the java jacket. This coffee drink has half and half-what do you think?是不行，但你可以让他们知道，你的机油是最好的——是世上最纯的机油。当心，握住有咖啡隔热套的地方。这杯咖啡里加的是一半牛奶、一半鲜奶油——你觉得呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是不行，但你可以让他们知道，你的机油是最好的——是世上最纯的机油。当心，握住有咖啡隔热套的地方。这杯咖啡里加的是一半牛奶、一半鲜奶油——你觉得呢？

title: 预订晚餐 Make a reservation

conversations.english: Bruno Bistro, how may I help you?布鲁诺的小酒馆，我能为您做点什么？
conversations.chinese: 布鲁诺的小酒馆，我能为您做点什么？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, hello, I would like to make a reservation please.是的，你好，我想预定晚餐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，你好，我想预定晚餐。

title: 享受印度美食 Indian food

conversations.english: So where is this mystery restaurant that we are going to?那个我们要去的神秘的餐厅在哪儿？
conversations.chinese: 那个我们要去的神秘的餐厅在哪儿？
conversations.reply_english: It' s an Indian restaurant! I know you have never had Indian food, so I thought you might want to try.那是个印度餐馆！我知道你没有吃过印度的食物，所以我想也许你会想尝试一下。
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是个印度餐馆！我知道你没有吃过印度的食物，所以我想也许你会想尝试一下。

title: 我是个绝对素食主义者 A vegan

conversations.english: Hey Julie, you want to go grab something to eat?朱莉，要不要出去吃点东西？
conversations.chinese: 朱莉，要不要出去吃点东西？
conversations.reply_english: Sure! What do you feel like having?好啊！你想吃什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好啊！你想吃什么？

conversations.english: Hi, welcome to Happy Buddah! Can I get you anything to drink?大家好，欢迎来到Happy Buddah！想喝点什么饮料?
conversations.chinese: 大家好，欢迎来到Happy Buddah！想喝点什么饮料?
conversations.reply_english: A Coke for me, please!给我来杯可乐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 给我来杯可乐。

title: 如何制作三明治 Make sandwich

conversations.english: Welcome to our show! Today, I am going to show you how to make the perfect mouthwatering sandwich! Are you ready? Let’s get started!欢迎收看我们的节目，今天我向你们展示如何制作美味的三明治。你准备好了吗？我们开始吧。
conversations.chinese: 欢迎收看我们的节目，今天我向你们展示如何制作美味的三明治。你准备好了吗？我们开始吧。
conversations.reply_english: Let’s start with the basics, bread. Bread is an important ingredient here. You need to remember one thing -choose the bread according to the following criteria, freshness, crumb and color. If you want a closed sandwich I recommend you first toast your bread in a toaster or oven, or grill it slightly until it gets a light brown color.我们从基本的开始, 面包。面包很重要。你需要记住一件事——根据下面的标准来选择面包，新鲜，面包屑和颜色。如果你想要个没有缝隙的三明治，我推荐你先在烤面包机或烤箱中烤面包，或轻烤面包制到面包有一层线褐色。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们从基本的开始, 面包。面包很重要。你需要记住一件事——根据下面的标准来选择面包，新鲜，面包屑和颜色。如果你想要个没有缝隙的三明治，我推荐你先在烤面包机或烤箱中烤面包，或轻烤面包制到面包有一层线褐色。

title: 你能摆饭桌吗 Set the table

conversations.english: Honey, can you set the table?亲爱的，你能摆饭桌吗？
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，你能摆饭桌吗？
conversations.reply_english: Um, sure. What are we having for dinner? Do I need to put out anything in particular?当然可以，晚餐我们吃什么？我需要摆些特别的东西吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以，晚餐我们吃什么？我需要摆些特别的东西吗？

conversations.english: Girls always like these Japanese-style hair clips.女孩子都喜欢这些日本风格的发夹。
conversations.chinese: 女孩子都喜欢这些日本风格的发夹。
conversations.reply_english: They are cute, most importantly, inexpensive.它们很可爱，最重要的是很便宜。
conversations.reply_chinese: 它们很可爱，最重要的是很便宜。

conversations.english: I’m hungry, let’s grab a bite to eat.我饿了，我们简单吃点东西.
conversations.chinese: 我饿了，我们简单吃点东西.
conversations.reply_english: Sure! How about we go home and prepare a couple of sandwiches?好的，我们回家做些三明治如何？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，我们回家做些三明治如何？

conversations.english: Oh, man. I had the best supper last night. My wife made a stir-fry and it was amazing!兄弟，我昨晚吃的炒青菜是最棒的。
conversations.chinese: 兄弟，我昨晚吃的炒青菜是最棒的。
conversations.reply_english: I love stir fry crispy bitesized vegetables covered in a mixture of soy sauce and oyster sauce. Wilted greens and fresh bean sprouts. Throw in some onion and garlic and ginger! Mmm! Mmm! It’s almost lunchtime. I would die for a plate of stir fry right now!我喜欢那种脆的一口就能吃掉的菜，上面盖满酱汁和耗油。枯萎的绿色配上新鲜的豆芽，再加上些洋葱，蒜和姜。现在快到吃午饭的时间了，我真想马上来一盘这样的炒菜。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢那种脆的一口就能吃掉的菜，上面盖满酱汁和耗油。枯萎的绿色配上新鲜的豆芽，再加上些洋葱，蒜和姜。现在快到吃午饭的时间了，我真想马上来一盘这样的炒菜。

conversations.english: Mom! How can I help with the washing up?妈妈，我来帮忙洗点东西？
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，我来帮忙洗点东西？
conversations.reply_english: You peel the onions and wash them, then chop them.你把洋葱削一下，然后洗洗， 再切碎。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你把洋葱削一下，然后洗洗， 再切碎。

conversations.english: You stay beside me. I'll fry the meat in the oil first.我先把肉炸一下，你站在我旁边。
conversations.chinese: 我先把肉炸一下，你站在我旁边。
conversations.reply_english: Daddy, what seasonings are you going to cook the meat with?爸爸，你准备用什么样的调味品呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 爸爸，你准备用什么样的调味品呢？

conversations.english: Dad, when will you finish your cooking?爸爸，你什么时候才能做完饭啊？
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，你什么时候才能做完饭啊？
conversations.reply_english: Several minutes.几分钟。
conversations.reply_chinese: 几分钟。

title: 我想先看看菜单再点菜

conversations.english: Tom, we are in the restaurant now！汤姆，我们到了饭馆了。
conversations.chinese: 汤姆，我们到了饭馆了。
conversations.reply_english: May I take your order?可以点菜了吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 可以点菜了吗？

title: 巧克力火锅最受欢迎了

conversations.english: Hey，I'm starving. I can eat a horse.嗨，我饿死了。我能吃下一匹马。
conversations.chinese: 嗨，我饿死了。我能吃下一匹马。
conversations.reply_english: May it be a chocolate horse.希望它是一匹巧克力马。
conversations.reply_chinese: 希望它是一匹巧克力马。

title: 元宵节到美食街去吃小吃

conversations.english: Aunt Shirley, I heard the Yuan Xiao Festival is the name for the festival. Why did it get its name?雪莉阿姨，我听说这个节日的名字是元宵节。这个名字是怎么来的呢？
conversations.chinese: 雪莉阿姨，我听说这个节日的名字是元宵节。这个名字是怎么来的呢？
conversations.reply_english: Well, the first lunar month is called Yuan-month, and in ancient times people called night Xiao. And you know the festival is just in the middle of the month.这个啊，农历的第一个月叫做元月，在中国古代人们把晚上叫做宵，而且你知道的，这个节目刚好是元月中间的那天。
conversations.reply_chinese: 这个啊，农历的第一个月叫做元月，在中国古代人们把晚上叫做宵，而且你知道的，这个节目刚好是元月中间的那天。

title: 我们要吃有机健康食物

conversations.english: OK darling, I got some pizzas, potato chips, hot dogs and lots of cheese!亲爱的，买些披萨，薯条，热河和多买一些奶酪。
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，买些披萨，薯条，热河和多买一些奶酪。
conversations.reply_english: Oh John, I thought we said we would start eating right! Remember? Our new healthy lifestyle? That’s all junk food!约翰，我们刚说过要吃健康的食物，我们新的健康的生活方式呢？你说的那些都是垃圾食品。
conversations.reply_chinese: 约翰，我们刚说过要吃健康的食物，我们新的健康的生活方式呢？你说的那些都是垃圾食品。

conversations.english: The fried shrimp is crunchy! But my mom will never cook shrimp this way. She always says that fried food is not healthy.炸虾好脆耶！可我妈妈从来不这么煮虾。她老是说吃油炸的东西不利于健康。
conversations.chinese: 炸虾好脆耶！可我妈妈从来不这么煮虾。她老是说吃油炸的东西不利于健康。
conversations.reply_english: How does she cook the shrimp?那她是怎么煮虾的？
conversations.reply_chinese: 那她是怎么煮虾的？

conversations.english: It's too expensive. Ten cookies cost a bundle.这也太贵了。10块小甜饼就 要那么多钱。
conversations.chinese: 这也太贵了。10块小甜饼就 要那么多钱。
conversations.reply_english: I noticed that they have Italian buffet upstairs. Maybe we should have chosen that?我发现楼上有意大利自助餐。 也许我们本该去那里的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我发现楼上有意大利自助餐。 也许我们本该去那里的。

conversations.english: The tea smells good. What tea is it?这茶真好闻。是什么茶呢？
conversations.chinese: 这茶真好闻。是什么茶呢？
conversations.reply_english: It's a special green tea named Longjing Tea from Zhejiang province.这是一种特殊的绿茶，名叫龙井茶，来自浙江省。
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是一种特殊的绿茶，名叫龙井茶，来自浙江省。

conversations.english: Honey, which hand should I use to hold the fork?亲爱的，应该用哪只手来拿叉子啊？
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，应该用哪只手来拿叉子啊？
conversations.reply_english: Left for the fork and right for the knife. Just remember that the stronger one is for knife.左手拿叉右手拿刀。只要记住强壮点的那只手拿刀就可以了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 左手拿叉右手拿刀。只要记住强壮点的那只手拿刀就可以了。

conversations.english: Grandpa, this restaurant looks really old! How long ago was it built?爷爷，这个餐厅看起来好旧啊。它建成多少年了啊？
conversations.chinese: 爷爷，这个餐厅看起来好旧啊。它建成多少年了啊？
conversations.reply_english: I'm not sure when it started. But I know it's older than me. As a young boy, I used to eat here a lot.我不是很确定它是什么时候开张的。但我知道它比我还老呢。我小的时候，就经常来这里吃东西的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不是很确定它是什么时候开张的。但我知道它比我还老呢。我小的时候，就经常来这里吃东西的。

conversations.english: I want you to know how much I appreciate these terrific meals you've been cooking. Do you guys always eat this well?我真的很感激你们做这么丰盛的饭菜。你们都经常吃这么好吗？
conversations.chinese: 我真的很感激你们做这么丰盛的饭菜。你们都经常吃这么好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Not really. During the week, we're both busy with our jobs, so there isn't much time to cook anything fancy.并不是这样。平时我们都忙于工作，所以没有多少时间烹饪出花样。
conversations.reply_chinese: 并不是这样。平时我们都忙于工作，所以没有多少时间烹饪出花样。

title: 请给我些美味的鸡腿肉

conversations.english: There's so much food on the table, I don't know where to begin.桌上这么多菜，我都不知道从哪里开始。
conversations.chinese: 桌上这么多菜，我都不知道从哪里开始。
conversations.reply_english: Pass your plate down to Chuck, Tina. He'll put meat on it. He always carves the turkey.把你的盘子递给查克，蒂娜。他会把肉放在上面。他总是切火鸡。
conversations.reply_chinese: 把你的盘子递给查克，蒂娜。他会把肉放在上面。他总是切火鸡。
